alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 17 at 2:01PM MDT until July 18 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT ON MONDAY FROM NOON UNTIL 8 PM MDT FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 322...325...326 AND 332 IN SOUTHWESTERN SOUTH DAKOTA... .Hot and dry weather will occur will occur on Monday. Southwest winds gusting up to 30 mph and low relative humidity may produce conditions favorable for large fire growth on Monday over parts of southwestern South Dakota where the fuels are reported to be very dry. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 322, 325, 326, AND 332... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 322 Fall River County Area, 325 Custer County Plains, 326 Pine Ridge Area and 332 Badlands Area. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area
